original_text: And Moses by the commandment of the Lord sent them from the wilderness of Paran: all those men were heads of the children of Israel.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 명령을 따라 바란 광야에서 그들을 보냈으니 그들은 다 이스라엘 자손의 수령 된 사람이라

sentences.original_text: And Moses by the commandment of the Lord
sent them from the wilderness of Paran:
